steps.title: Upload Your Files
steps.description: Select archaeological documents, images, or datasets from your computer

steps.title: Add Metadata
steps.description: Provide details about your files to help others discover and use them

steps.title: Share with Researchers
steps.description: Your files will be available to archaeologists and researchers worldwide

faqs.question: What types of archaeological data can I upload?
faqs.answer: You can upload excavation reports, artifact catalogs, site maps, photographs, 3D scans, and any other research materials related to archaeology.

faqs.question: How is my data protected?
faqs.answer: All uploaded files are stored securely. You can choose between public sharing or restricted access for sensitive materials.

faqs.question: Can I upload large datasets?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support large file uploads up to 5GB per file. For even larger datasets, please contact our support team.

faqs.question: How do I cite materials I find here?
faqs.answer: Each file includes citation information that you can use in your research. Please give proper attribution to the original contributors.
